articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Why the US evacuation from Sudan left Americans behind - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Most of the estimated 16,000 Americans believed to be in Sudan right now are dual US-Sudanese nationals.
articles.content:
Warring factions trying to seize control of Sudan have plunged the country into chaos, and thousands are fleeing the capital of Khartoum and nearby battle zones.
Some countries have shuttered their … [+6752 chars]

articles.author: Kari Paul
articles.title: Tucker Carlson breaks silence after abrupt departure from Fox News - The Guardian
articles.description: Former Fox star did not address his reported firing but offered sweeping complaints about the state of American discourse
articles.content:
Tucker Carlson has broken his silence for the first time since his abrupt departure from Fox News, posting a video to Twitter that did not directly address his reported firing.
